title: Training Coordinator
description: The coordinator will be responsible for the Crisis Intervention Team (CIT) training, a collaborative program of mental health professionals, law enforcement and community partners to improve responses to mental health crises. You can get further details about the nature of this opening, and what is expected from applicants, by reading the below. The individual will be hired and supervised by NAMI Lehigh Valley but will work closely with Northampton County Mental Health (NCMH) staff.

title: 1st shift Production Control Lead
description: Job Description Job Description Hood Container Corporation (HCC) in Allentown, PA is seeking a dynamic leader to join our team as Production Control Lead. The Production Control Lead is a working position that has overall first level responsibility for the efficient and correct operation of a packing or assembly line and assists with the oversight of Line Coordinators and forklift drivers.
